title: M. Roma Volley
text:
M. Roma Volley is an Italian <a href="volleyball">volleyball</a> <a href="sports%20club">club</a> playing in the <a href="Italian%20Volleyball%20League">Italian Volleyball League</a>. 
The club was founded in 2006. It currently plays in the Italian <a href="Italian%20Volleyball%20League">Serie A1</a> (Italy's top division).
